title: Is the Kha'zix compensation on Q seriously going live?
body: Seriously, nobody thought this was just a little too much of a damage boost?

replies.body:
If its not an adc most people don't care


From what i've seen on the boards.
I do. Every time Riot has so much as touched Kha ever since the assassin update, they've inadvertently made him overbearing to play against/pick or ban.

like i said, most... you're in the minority.


And don't get me wrong, i completely agree with you.
If you think that's fun look at the zed buffs.
